name: Score Run
description:
There are 4 minigames that changes rules and others things... if you win a minigame you get 10 Score Points. To Win you need to get 250 Score Points in 2 Minutes 

Every game has a time limit of 10 seconds

Rules are random and you have no control... well not even me the developer don't know what's going to happen to you so...

Good Luck

All the necessary controls are Mouse Left and Right and WASD ( Sometimes..)
